Terms of Use
------------

Your use of these documents is subject to these Terms of Use (these "Terms").  We may modify these Terms at any time without notice to you by posting revised Terms on our site.  Your use of our site constitutes your binding acceptance of these Terms, including any modifications that we make.

​

You acknowledge that the documentation provided on this site may not be complete or accurate and is provided for reference as a courtesy to those using this site.

​

For copies of the exact ordinances as passed by the council of the Town of Annetta, please contact the City Secretary of Annetta.
